page.title: 06HORTICULTURE AND AGRICULTURE
page.content: The intensive horticultural unit at Farthing Common,with large scale tomato production for the U.K.market and for export,is switching to processed domestic refuse to replace oil for heating the 4.1/7 acres of glass houses. Postling Court Farm is concerned almost exclusively with the production of fruit and operates as a "Pick your own" centre in addition to producing crops such as blackcurrants for the canning industry. Concern is voiced for the affect of Common Market policies on the production of fruit in the area.
